mapper.select: select ts.id,ts.username,ts.name,ts.sex,ts.classid,ts.createTime,ts.status,tc.name className,tp.name professionName,td.name departName from t_student ts left join t_class tc on tc.id = ts.classid left join t_profession tp on tp.id = tc.professionid left join t_depart td on td.id = tp.departId where ts.username = #{username} and ts.password = #{password}
select id,username,name,departId from t_leader where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
select url from t_commonFile where name = #{fileName}
mapper.update: update t_student set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
update t_teacher set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
update t_leader set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from t_student where username = #{username} and password = #{oldPass}
